item.title: Mini-Sequence Transformers: Optimizing Intermediate Memory for Long Sequences Training
item.description: MINI-SEQUENCE TRANSFORMER (MST) drastically reduces memory usage in LLM training by processing mini-sequences iteratively, enabling training with 12-24x longer sequences than conventional methods with…

item.title: Understanding Model Selection for Learning in Strategic Environments
item.description: Larger machine learning models don’t always mean better performance; strategic interactions can reverse this trend, as this research shows, prompting a new paradigm for model selection in games.
